# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-huawei-openstack-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1068/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-openstack/osdriverservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC1/osdriverservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-driver-huawei-openstack-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f sdno-driver-huawei-openstack-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8503
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1068 > VERSION
